ygData.subject: JMX command line
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I m just looking at the cmdline-jmx client and heritrix. I am using java version 1.5.0_04 on gentoo and Heritrix 1.4. When I run: java -jar

Hi,

I'm just looking at the cmdline-jmx client and heritrix. I am using  
java version "1.5.0_04" on gentoo and Heritrix 1.4.

When I run:

java -jar cmdline-jmxclient-0.10.3.jar monitorRole:*****  
192.168.2.4:8849 org.archive.crawler:name=Heritrix

it just sits there. if I alter the port or IP I get an error so it is  
connecting to something.

I was expecting some kind of response - what am I doing wrong?

cheers

mark
